name: Clapy.co - From design to code, in 1 click (React, HTML, CSS)
description:
Generate clean React, HTML and CSS code from your Figma files in a few seconds.


How it works:


  1. Select the element you want to code
  2. Click <Generate code>
  3. Done: you can preview the result on your browser and/or get the code.
